metadata.title: CVE-2024-42264 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:drm/v3d: Prevent out of bounds access in performance query extensionsCheck that the number of perfmons userspace is passing in the copy andreset extensions is not greater than the internal kernel storage wherethe ids will be copied into.(cherry picked from commit f32b5128d2c440368b5bf3a7a356823e235caabb)

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-azure-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-gcp-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
